mapper.insert: insert into sys_captcha (id, uuid, code, gmt_last_update, gmt_expire) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtLastUpdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtExpire,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select id, uuid, code, gmt_last_update, gmt_expire from sys_captcha
